docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: example_mkdocstrings_lib
docs.text:
Without section-index plugin, init is a separate entry in the nav bar.

With the plugin it just becomes the index/landing page for the library.

TEST! I'M DIFFERENT. I'm different again. Use mkdocs serve --watch src/ for live changes.

docs.title: MyClass
docs.text:
Lorem ipsum

Source code in src/example_mkdocstrings_lib/MyClass.py 
class MyClass:
    """
    Lorem ipsum
    """

    def __init__(self, foo: str) -> None:
        self.foo: str = foo

    @override
    def __str__(self) -> str:
        return self.foo
